paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods

paymentMethods.securityNote: All our transactions are protected and backed by our refund and privacy policies, ensuring the protection of your data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.heading: Have Questions?
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help
contact.description: Our team is available 24/7 to help you with any questions or concerns.

page.title: Store

errors.missingInfo: Missing customer information or payment method

form.title: Account Verification
form.subtitle: Enter your Epic ID and email to continue
form.epicIdHint: Your Fortnite username (you can find it in the lobby or profile)
form.contactPreferenceLabel: How would you like us to contact you?
form.contactHint: You'll receive a code here to view your purchases

verified.title: Account Verified
verified.subtitle: Review your details before continuing
verified.storeItemsWarning: You have {count} item(s) from the store. We'll verify your friendship with our bots when you continue.

errors.invalidWhatsapp: Please enter a valid WhatsApp number (e.g.: +1234567890)

friendRequest.title: You need to add our Bots as friends to continue
friendRequest.description: We detected you have {count} item(s) from the store in your cart. These items are sent as gifts through our Fortnite Bots, so you need to have them as friends.
friendRequest.tipText: You usually get better results if you add more than one Bot.
friendRequest.waitTime: Due to store policies, we cannot send your purchase until 48 hours after you accept the friendship.
friendRequest.dailyLimitText: Each Bot can only send 5 items per day, so we recommend adding multiple Bots.
friendRequest.stepsText: Copy the Bot ID, add them as a friend in Fortnite, wait for them to accept the request, and after 48 hours return here to continue with your purchase.
friendRequest.alternativeText: You have {count} item(s) in your cart that don't require friendship with the Bots (V-Bucks, Crew or Bundles). You can continue your purchase with just those items.

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method
paymentMethod.subtitle: Select how you want to pay for your order
paymentMethod.label: Payment Method:
paymentMethod.noMethods: No payment methods available at this time.
paymentMethod.cryptoDisclaimer: For crypto payments, we recommend choosing networks with low fees such as <bold>LTC, Polygon or TRON</bold> to avoid high network costs.

manualCheckout.title: Manual Process Required
manualCheckout.description: Your cart contains items that require a manual verification and delivery process. To continue with your purchase, you'll need to contact us via WhatsApp.
manualCheckout.step2: A conversation will open with all your order information
manualCheckout.step3: Our team will guide you through the payment and delivery process
manualCheckout.step4: You'll receive your purchase once the process is complete
